actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to authorize the President to appoint Vice Admiral Hyman G. Rickover, United States Navy retired, to the grade of admiral on the retired list.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to appoint Vice Admiral Hyman G. Rickover, United States Navy retired, to the grade of admiral on the retired list.
